alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 24 at 1:56PM CDT until May 25 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Little River near Tecumseh affecting Seminole and Pottawatomie Counties.
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC125-133-250700- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.Y.0012.000000T0000Z-220525T1800Z/ /TCMO2.N.ER.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NO/ 156 PM CDT Tue May 24 2022 ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Little River near Tecumseh. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Near bankfull flows occur along the river and downstream of Lake Thunderbird... from near Macomb in Pottawatomie County to near Bowlegs in western Seminole County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 4.9 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise to a crest of 9.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
